suite.name: Gameplay

test.name: Play a Standard Game

kw.name: Go To Tic Tac Toe Site
kw.doc: Open a browser and navigate to `https://codepen.io/jshlfts32/full/bjambP/` to play Tic Tac Toe!

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Start A New Game
kw.doc: Start a new game of Tic Tac Toe on the site. Default board ``size`` is 3x3.
kw.msg: Starting a new game of Tic Tac Toe on a 3x3 board.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 1 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 2 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 3 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 1 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 2 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 3 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 3, column 1 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 3, column 2 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 3, column 3 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Verify the standard game board is filled with the expected letters when cells are clicked.

test.name: Clicking Multiple Times In A Single Cell Should Have No Effect

kw.name: Go To Tic Tac Toe Site
kw.doc: Open a browser and navigate to `https://codepen.io/jshlfts32/full/bjambP/` to play Tic Tac Toe!

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Start A New Game
kw.doc: Start a new game of Tic Tac Toe on the site. Default board ``size`` is 3x3.
kw.msg: Starting a new game of Tic Tac Toe on a 3x3 board.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 1 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Expect Error
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and checks that the expected error occurred.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 1 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.msg: Unexpected content found in row 1, column 1. Expected O, but found something else.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Verify an already occupied table cell cannot be replaced by another letter.

suite.doc: Tic Tac Toe is a game between two players (`X` and `O`) taking turns writing letters in table cells. In this variant, players can choose the size of the starting board, and then click in the generated boxes to input letters until the game is over.

suite.name: GameResults

test.name: Win with X in a Row

kw.doc: Open a browser and navigate to `https://codepen.io/jshlfts32/full/bjambP/` to play Tic Tac Toe!

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Start A New Game
kw.doc: Start a new game of Tic Tac Toe on the site. Default board ``size`` is 3x3.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 1 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 1 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 2 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).
kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 2 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.
kw.msg: Clicking row 1, column 3 to place an X in the cell.

kw.name: Winner Should Be Declared
kw.doc: Verify that the correct winner is declared after a game is over.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

arguments.arg: Congratulations player ${expected_winner}! You've won. Refresh to play again!

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.msg: Element 'id:endgame' did not get text 'Congratulations player X! You've won. Refresh to play again!' in 5 seconds.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: If *X* fills a row, then player `X` should be declared the winner.
test.status: Element 'id:endgame' did not get text 'Congratulations player X! You've won. Refresh to play again!' in 5 seconds.

test.name: Win with X in a Column

kw.name: Go To Tic Tac Toe Site
kw.doc: Open a browser and navigate to `https://codepen.io/jshlfts32/full/bjambP/` to play Tic Tac Toe!

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Start A New Game
kw.doc: Start a new game of Tic Tac Toe on the site. Default board ``size`` is 3x3.
kw.msg: Starting a new game of Tic Tac Toe on a 3x3 board.

kw.name: Fill The 3x3 Board So There Is No Winner
kw.doc: No rows, columns, or diagonals will be occupied by a a single letter.

kw.name: Enter X In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based). If the space is already occupied, this will cause an error.

kw.msg: Clicking row 2, column 2 to place an O in the cell.

kw.name: Enter O In Table Cell
kw.doc: Click in the displayed Tic Tac Toe board to enter an X into the desired cell, defined by the ``row`` index and ``column`` index (1-based).

kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: If a full row, column or diagonal does not contain a single letter, the game should be drawn.

test.name: No Input Should Be Possible After Game Has Ended

test.doc: After a winner or a draw is declared, no further gameplay should be allowed.
test.status: Expected error 'Unexpected content found in row 3, column 3. Expected O, but found something else.' did not occur.

suite.doc: The game is won when a player fills a full table row, column, or diagonal with their letter or no table cells are left before this result is reached (a draw). Start a new game by refreshing the web page.

suite.name: NewGame

test.name: Start a New Standard Game

kw.name: Go To Tic Tac Toe Site
kw.doc: Open a browser and navigate to `https://codepen.io/jshlfts32/full/bjambP/` to play Tic Tac Toe!

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Start A New Game
kw.doc: Start a new game of Tic Tac Toe on the site. Default board ``size`` is 3x3.
kw.msg: Starting a new game of Tic Tac Toe on a 3x3 board.

kw.name: Game Board Should Be Displayed
kw.doc: Verify that the Tic Tac Toe board has the expected ``size`` in the format *NxN*.

kw.name: Game Board Should Be Empty
kw.doc: Verify that all table cells are empty on the game board.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Input '3' then click *Play* to generate a standard 3x3 Tic Tac Toe board to play on. All cells should be empty to begin with.

test.name: Start a New Non-Standard Game

suite.doc: Start a Tic Tac Toe game by entering a number in the input box, then click `Play`.
